bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: CUDA: 3D CNNs failing some gradient checks
bug.description: Same tests are passing on CPU, failing on CUDA... numerical gradients are all 0s. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2360237/39870034-350f1d62-54a3-11e8-8116-65d63fce032f.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
